```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
# nine eleven
us_date <- "9-11-2001"
no_date <- "11/9/2001"
typeof(us_date)
```

```{r}
us_d <- mdy(us_date) # note mdy
typeof(us_d)
```

```{r}
no_d <- dmy(no_date) #note dmy
typeof(no_d)
```

```{r}
today() # date
```

```{r}
# change type
as_date(now())
```

```{r}
as_datetime(today())
```
